attributes.action: Legislate to protect BBC independence from political and corporate influence.
attributes.additional_details: The BBC has always stood as a bastion of free, fair and independent reporting and quality programming. However, since changes to its structure and governance  appointments system in 2007; and more recently facing increasing  political and corporate influence bearing down upon broadcasting values and decision-making, means The BBC risks succumbing to pressure from malign actors seeking to ensure favourable reporting and the promotion of untruths in their own interests. This must be prevented.
attributes.background: Pass an act reconstituting the BBC as a nationally owned corporation independent from government and whose leadership does not arise from government appointments; state funded and constitutionally barred from any form of  private sector leadership,  governance or influence of private companies.

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Amend BBC's Royal charter to bar and remove political advisers from BBC Board
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/750310
